00020 #define SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(x) if(x) delete[] x; x=NULL;

00022 // define a callback function we can work with
00023 void CCallback(void *unused, Uint8 *stream, int len)
00024 {
00025     // let it call a method on my (singleton) sound object
00026     g_pSound->callback(unused, stream, len);
00027 }

00029 CSound::CSound() {
00030  m_active = false;
00031  m_mixing_channels = 0;
00032  m_MixedForm = NULL;
00033  AudioSpec.channels = 2; // Stereo Sound
00034 #if defined(WIZ) || defined(GP2X) || defined(DINGOO)
00035  AudioSpec.format = AUDIO_S16; // 16-bit sound
00036 #else
00037  AudioSpec.format = AUDIO_U8; // 8-bit sound
00038 #endif
00039  AudioSpec.freq = 44100; // high quality
00040 
00041  m_MusicVolume = SDL_MIX_MAXVOLUME;
00042  m_SoundVolume = SDL_MIX_MAXVOLUME;
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool CSound::init(void)
00046 {
00047  char name[256];
00048  SDL_AudioSpec *desired, *obtained;
00049 
00050  desired = &AudioSpec;
00051  obtained = new SDL_AudioSpec;
00052 
00053  // now start up the SDL sound system
00054  AudioSpec.silence = 0;
00055 
00056  switch (AudioSpec.freq)
00057  {
00058   case 11025: AudioSpec.samples = 256; break;
00059   case 22050: AudioSpec.samples = 512; break;
00060   default: AudioSpec.samples = 1024; break;
00061  }
00062  AudioSpec.callback = CCallback;
00063  AudioSpec.userdata = NULL;
00064 
00065  /* Initialize variables */
00066  if( SDL_OpenAudio(desired, obtained) < 0 )
00067  {
00068   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("SoundDrv_Start(): Couldn't open audio: %s<br>", SDL_GetError());
00069   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Sound will be disabled.<br>");
00070   AudioSpec.channels = 0;
00071   AudioSpec.format = 0;
00072   AudioSpec.freq = 0;
00073   m_active = false;
00074   return false;
00075  }
00076 
00077  memcpy(&AudioSpec,obtained,sizeof(SDL_AudioSpec));
00078  delete obtained;
00079 
00080  m_MixedForm = new Uint8[AudioSpec.size];
00081 
00082  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("SDL_AudioSpec:<br>");
00083  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("  freq: %d<br>", AudioSpec.freq);
00084  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("  channels: %d<br>", AudioSpec.channels);
00085  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("  audio buffer size: %d<br>", AudioSpec.size);
00086  switch( AudioSpec.format )
00087  {
00088   case AUDIO_U8:
00089    g_pLogFile->ftextOut("  format: AUDIO_U8<br>" );
00090    break;
00091   case AUDIO_S8:
00092    g_pLogFile->ftextOut("  format: AUDIO_S8<br>" );
00093    break;
00094   case AUDIO_U16:
00095    g_pLogFile->ftextOut("  format: AUDIO_U16<br>" );
00096    break;
00097   case AUDIO_S16:
00098    g_pLogFile->ftextOut("  format: AUDIO_S16<br>" );
00099    break;
00100   default:
00101    g_pLogFile->ftextOut("  format: UNKNOWN %d<br>", AudioSpec.format );
00102  }
00103  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Using audio driver: %s<br>", SDL_AudioDriverName(name, 32));
00104 
00105  m_mixing_channels = 15;
00106 
00107  if(!m_soundchannel.empty())
00108   m_soundchannel.clear();
00109  m_soundchannel.assign(m_mixing_channels, CSoundChannel(AudioSpec));
00110 
00111  SDL_PauseAudio(0);
00112 
00113  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Sound System: SDL sound system initialized.<br>");
00114  m_active = true;
00115 
00116  return true;
00117 }
00118 
00119 void CSound::destroy(void)
00120 {
00121  stopAllSounds();
00122 
00123  if (m_active)
00124  {
00125   SDL_PauseAudio(1);
00126   SDL_CloseAudio();
00127   m_active = false;
00128   m_mixing_channels = 0;
00129  }
00130  SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(m_MixedForm);
00131 
00132  if(!m_soundchannel.empty())
00133   m_soundchannel.clear();
00134 
00135  if(!m_soundslot.empty())
00136   m_soundslot.clear();
00137 
00138  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("SoundDrv_Stop(): shut down.<br>");
00139 }

00141 // stops all currently playing sounds
00142 void CSound::stopAllSounds(void)
00143 {
00144  std::vector<CSoundChannel>::iterator snd_chnl = m_soundchannel.begin();
00145  for( ; snd_chnl != m_soundchannel.end() ; snd_chnl++)
00146   snd_chnl->stopSound();
00147 }
00148 
00149 // pauses any currently playing sounds
00150 void CSound::pauseSound(void)
00151 {
00152  if (m_active) SDL_PauseAudio(1);
00153 }
00154 
00155 // resumes playing a previously paused sound
00156 void CSound::resumeSounds(void)
00157 {
00158  if (m_active) SDL_PauseAudio(0);
00159 }

00161 // returns true if sound snd is currently playing
00162 bool CSound::isPlaying(GameSound snd)
00163 {
00164  std::vector<CSoundChannel>::iterator snd_chnl = m_soundchannel.begin();
00165  for( ; snd_chnl != m_soundchannel.end() ; snd_chnl++)
00166  {
00167   if (snd_chnl->isPlaying())
00168    if (snd_chnl->getCurrentsound() == snd)
00169     return true;
00170  }
00171  return false;
00172 }
00173 
00174 // if sound snd is currently playing, stops it immediately
00175 void CSound::stopSound(GameSound snd)
00176 {
00177  std::vector<CSoundChannel>::iterator snd_chnl = m_soundchannel.begin();
00178  for( ; snd_chnl != m_soundchannel.end() ; snd_chnl++)
00179  {
00180   if (snd_chnl->isPlaying())
00181    if (snd_chnl->getCurrentsound() == snd)
00182     snd_chnl->stopSound();
00183  }
00184 }
00185 
00186 // returns true if a sound is currently playing in PLAY_FORCE mode
00187 bool CSound::forcedisPlaying(void)
00188 {
00189  std::vector<CSoundChannel>::iterator snd_chnl = m_soundchannel.begin();
00190  for( ; snd_chnl != m_soundchannel.end() ; snd_chnl++)
00191   if(snd_chnl->isForcedPlaying())
00192    return true;
00193 
00194  return false;
00195 }

00197 int maxval = 0;

00199 void CSound::callback(void *unused, Uint8 *stream, int len)
00200 {
00201 #if defined(OGG) || defined(TREMOR)
00202     if (g_pMusicPlayer->playing() == PLAY_MODE_PLAY)
00203     {
00204      g_pMusicPlayer->readBuffer(m_MixedForm, len);
00205      mixAudio(stream, m_MixedForm, len, m_MusicVolume, AudioSpec.format);
00206     }
00207 #endif
00208 
00209  std::vector<CSoundChannel>::iterator snd_chnl = m_soundchannel.begin();
00210  for( ; snd_chnl != m_soundchannel.end() ; snd_chnl++)
00211     {
00212   snd_chnl->readWaveform(m_MixedForm, len, AudioSpec.channels, AudioSpec.freq);
00213      mixAudio(stream, m_MixedForm, len, m_SoundVolume, AudioSpec.format);
00214     }
00215 }
00216 
00217 // if priorities allow, plays the sound "snd".
00218 // nonzero return value indicates a higher priority sound is playing.
00219 void CSound::playSound(GameSound snd, char mode)
00220 {
00221  playStereosound(snd, mode, 0);
00222 }
00223 
00224 void CSound::playStereofromCoord(GameSound snd, char mode, unsigned int xcoordinate)
00225 {
00226     if(AudioSpec.channels == 2)
00227     {
00228      int bal;
00229 
00230      bal = ((short)(xcoordinate) - (320>>1)); // Faster calculation of balance transformation
00231 
00232      if(bal < -127)
00233       bal = -127;
00234      else if(bal > 127)
00235       bal = 127;
00236 
00237      playStereosound(snd, mode, bal);
00238  }
00239     else
00240      playSound(snd, mode);
00241 }
00242 
00243 void CSound::playStereosound(GameSound snd, char mode, short balance)
00244 {
00245  if(!(m_mixing_channels && m_active)) return;
00246 
00247  std::vector<CSoundChannel>::iterator snd_chnl;
00248 
00249  if (mode==PLAY_NORESTART)
00250  {
00251   if (isPlaying(snd))
00252    return;
00253  }
00254 
00255  // if a forced sound is playing then let it play
00256  if (forcedisPlaying()) return;
00257 
00258  // stop all other sounds if this sound has maximum priority
00259  if ( mode==PLAY_FORCE )
00260   stopAllSounds();
00261 
00262  // first try to find an empty channel
00263  for( snd_chnl = m_soundchannel.begin() ; snd_chnl != m_soundchannel.end() ; snd_chnl++)
00264  {
00265   if (!snd_chnl->isPlaying())
00266   {
00267    if(AudioSpec.channels == 2)
00268     snd_chnl->setBalance(balance);
00269 
00270    snd_chnl->enableHighQuality(m_soundslot[snd].isHighQuality());
00271    snd_chnl->setupSound( snd, 0, true, 0, (mode==PLAY_FORCE) ? true : false, AudioSpec.format );
00272    break;
00273   }
00274  }
00275 }

00277 void CSound::setGameData(CExeFile &ExeFile)
00278 {
00279  m_Episode = ExeFile.getEpisode();
00280  m_DataDirectory = ExeFile.getDataDirectory();
00281 }

00283 bool CSound::loadSoundData(CExeFile &ExeFile)
00284 {
00285  if(!m_active) return false;
00286 
00287  bool ok = true;
00288  const std::string soundfile = "sounds.ck" + itoa(m_Episode);
00289 
00290  if(!m_soundslot.empty())
00291   m_soundslot.clear();
00292 
00293  for(int i=0 ; i<MAX_SOUNDS ; i++)
00294  {
00295   m_soundslot[i].setpAudioSpec(&AudioSpec);
00296   m_soundslot[i].m_gamepath = m_DataDirectory;
00297  }
00298 
00299  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("sound_load_all(): loading all sounds...<br>");
00300 
00301  std::ifstream file;
00302  if(!OpenGameFileR(file, getResourceFilename(soundfile,m_DataDirectory,false,true), std::ios::binary))
00303  {
00304   std::string exename = "keen" + itoa(m_Episode) + ".exe";
00305   g_pLogFile->textOut("sound_load_all(): \"" + soundfile + "\" was not found in the data directory. Looking for \""+ exename +"\" in \"" + m_DataDirectory + "\" and trying to extract this file<br>");
00306   extractOfExeFile(ExeFile);
00307  }
00308  else
00309   file.close();
00310 
00311  ok  = m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_WALK].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "KEENWALKSND", SOUND_KEEN_WALK);
00312  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_WALK2].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "KEENWLK2SND", SOUND_KEEN_WALK2);
00313  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_JUMP].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "KEENJUMPSND", SOUND_KEEN_JUMP);
00314  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_POGO].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "KEENPOGOSND", SOUND_KEEN_POGO);
00315  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_LAND].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "KEENLANDSND", SOUND_KEEN_LAND);
00316  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_BLOK].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "KEENBLOKSND", SOUND_KEEN_BLOK);
00317  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_DIE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "KEENDIESND", SOUND_KEEN_DIE);
00318  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_FALL].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "PLUMMETSND", SOUND_KEEN_FALL);
00319  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_BUMPHEAD].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "BUMPHEADSND", SOUND_KEEN_BUMPHEAD);
00320  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_ENTER_LEVEL].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "WLDENTERSND", SOUND_ENTER_LEVEL);
00321  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEENSLEFT].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "keensleft", SOUND_KEENSLEFT);
00322 
00323  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_FIRE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "KEENFIRESND", SOUND_KEEN_FIRE);
00324  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_GUN_CLICK].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "GUNCLICK", SOUND_GUN_CLICK);
00325  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_SHOT_HIT].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "SHOTHIT", SOUND_SHOT_HIT);
00326 
00327  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_GET_ITEM].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "GOTITEMSND", SOUND_GET_ITEM);
00328  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_GET_BONUS].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "GOTBONUSSND", SOUND_GET_BONUS);
00329  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_GET_PART].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "GOTPARTSND", SOUND_GET_PART);
00330  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_LEVEL_DONE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "LVLDONESND", SOUND_LEVEL_DONE);
00331  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_GAME_OVER].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "GAMEOVERSND", SOUND_GAME_OVER);
00332  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_TELEPORT].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "TELEPORTSND", SOUND_TELEPORT);
00333  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_EXTRA_LIFE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "EXTRAMANSND", SOUND_EXTRA_LIFE);
00334  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_CANNONFIRE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "CANNONFIRE", SOUND_CANNONFIRE);
00335  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_CHUNKSMASH].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "CHUNKSMASH", SOUND_CHUNKSMASH);
00336  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_GOINDOOR].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "GOINDOORSND", SOUND_GOINDOOR);
00337  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_GET_CARD].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "GETCARDSND", SOUND_GET_CARD);
00338  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_USE_KEY].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "USEKEYSND", SOUND_USE_KEY);
00339  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_SWITCH_TOGGLE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "CLICKSND", SOUND_SWITCH_TOGGLE);
00340  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_DOOR_OPEN].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "DOOROPENSND", SOUND_DOOR_OPEN);
00341 
00342  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_YORP_BUMP].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "YORPBUMPSND", SOUND_YORP_BUMP);
00343  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_YORP_STUN].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "YORPBOPSND", SOUND_YORP_STUN);
00344  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_YORP_DIE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "YORPSCREAM", SOUND_YORP_DIE);
00345  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_GARG_DIE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "GARGSCREAM", SOUND_GARG_DIE);
00346  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_VORT_DIE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "vortscream", SOUND_VORT_DIE);
00347  ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_TANK_FIRE].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "TANKFIRE", SOUND_TANK_FIRE);
00348 
00349  if (m_Episode == 2)
00350  {
00351   ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_KEEN_BLOK].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "EARTHPOW", SOUND_EARTHPOW);
00352  }
00353  else if (m_Episode == 3)
00354  {
00355   ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_MEEP].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "MEEP", SOUND_MEEP);
00356   ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_ANKH].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "ANKH", SOUND_ANKH);
00357   ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_MORTIMER].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "MORTIMER", SOUND_MORTIMER);
00358   ok &= m_soundslot[SOUND_FOOTSLAM].loadSound(soundfile, m_DataDirectory, "FOOTSLAM", SOUND_FOOTSLAM);
00359  }
00360 
00361  std::vector<CSoundChannel>::iterator snd_chnl = m_soundchannel.begin();
00362  for( ; snd_chnl != m_soundchannel.end() ; snd_chnl++)
00363   snd_chnl->setSoundSlotPtr(m_soundslot);
00364 
00365  return ok;
00366 }
00367 
00368 /*  char extractOfExeFile(const std::string& inputpath, int episode)
00369 
00370  Utility to extract the embedded sounds from Commander Keen
00371  Episode 2 (keen2.exe) and Episode 3 (keen3.exe)
00372 
00373  Implemented by Gerhard Stein  <gerstrong@gmail.com> (2008,2009)
00374  Copyright (C) 2007 Hans de Goede  <j.w.r.degoede@hhs.nl>
00375 
00376  Many thanks to Mitugu(Kou) Kurizono for the decompression algorithm.
00377 
00378  Modification by Gerstrong 2009
00379  The new version uses a class named CExeFile which is able to manage compressed or
00380  uncompressed files. The function simply let the class do its job and then copy
00381  the sound data.
00382  */
00383 
00384 char CSound::extractOfExeFile(CExeFile &ExeFile)
00385 {
00386  std::string outputfname;
00387  int bit_count;
00388  int pos, sounds_start, sounds_end, ret = 0;
00389  std::string buffer;
00390  std::string inputpath = ExeFile.getDataDirectory();
00391  char episode = ExeFile.getEpisode();
00392 
00393 
00394  pos = 0;
00395  bit_count = 0;
00396 
00397  // Set Offsets. Episode 1 already provides this
00398  if (episode == 2)
00399  {
00400      outputfname = "sounds.ck2";
00401      sounds_start  = 0x12730;
00402      sounds_end    = 0x14BDA;
00403  }
00404  else if (episode == 3)
00405  {
00406      outputfname = "sounds.ck3";
00407      sounds_start  = 0x13A70;
00408      sounds_end    = 0x164D4;
00409  }
00410  else
00411  {
00412   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Error: Unknown episode: %d<br>", episode);
00413      return 1;
00414  }
00415 
00416  FILE *fout;
00417 
00418  buffer = inputpath;
00419  if( *(buffer.end()) != '/') buffer  += "/";
00420  buffer += outputfname;
00421 
00422  if(!(fout = OpenGameFile(buffer.c_str(),"wb"))) ret = 1;
00423  else
00424  {
00425   fwrite( ExeFile.getRawData()+sounds_start, 1, (sounds_end-sounds_start), fout);
00426   g_pLogFile->ftextOut(GREEN,"Sounds extraction completed successfully<br>");
00427   fclose(fout);
00428  }
00429 
00430  return ret;
00431 }
00432 
00433 void CSound::setSoundmode(int freq, bool stereo, Uint16 format)
00434 {
00435  AudioSpec.channels = (stereo==true) ? 2 : 1;
00436  AudioSpec.format = format;
00437 
00438  switch(freq)
00439  {
00440   case 0: break; // means that the actual frequency stays untouched
00441   case 11025:
00442   case 22050:
00443   case 44100:
00444   case 48000:
00445    AudioSpec.freq = freq;
00446    break;
00447   default:
00448    AudioSpec.freq = 44100;
00449  }
00450 }
00451 
00452 CSound::~CSound() {
00453  destroy();
00454  if (!m_soundslot.empty())
00455   m_soundslot.clear();
00456  if (!m_soundchannel.empty())
00457   m_soundchannel.clear();
00458 }
